pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, July 10, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

 Montréal, Quebec

5:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will host a roundtable discussion with community stakeholders.


Chic Resto Pop
1500, avenue d’Orléans

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to arrive at the main entrance no later than 5:00 p.m.
